fields.name: Kazan
fields.description: Kazan is the capital and largest city of the Republic of Tatarstan, Russia. It is known for its rich history, diverse culture, and stunning architecture.
fields.geographic_location: Eastern Europe, situated on the banks of the Volga River.
fields.tourist_attractions: Kazan Kremlin, Kul Sharif Mosque, Bauman Street
fields.culinary_delights: Tatar cuisine, including dishes like chak-chak and echpochmak.
fields.events_and_festivals: Sabantuy, Kazan International Festival of Muslim Cinema

fields.name: Yekaterinburg
fields.description: Yekaterinburg is a major city in the Ural Mountains of Russia. It is known for its industrial heritage, vibrant arts scene, and unique architecture.
fields.tourist_attractions: Church on the Blood, Yeltsin Center, Ganina Yama
fields.culinary_delights: Ural cuisine, featuring dishes like pelmeni and kholodets.

fields.name: Novosibirsk
fields.description: Novosibirsk is the largest city in Siberia and a key cultural and industrial hub. It's known for its thriving science and education institutions.
fields.tourist_attractions: Novosibirsk Opera and Ballet Theatre, Akademgorodok
fields.culinary_delights: Siberian cuisine, famous for pelmeni and omul fish

fields.name: Saint Petersburg
fields.description: Saint Petersburg is Russia's second-largest city and a cultural center, known for its impressive architecture, historic sites, and rich artistic heritage.
fields.geographic_location: Northwestern Russia, situated on the Neva River.
fields.tourist_attractions: Hermitage Museum, Peter and Paul Fortress, Church of the Savior on Spilled Blood
fields.culinary_delights: Russian cuisine, offering traditional dishes like borscht and blini.
fields.events_and_festivals: White Nights Festival, International Economic Forum

fields.name: Moscow
fields.description: Moscow is the capital and largest city of Russia, known for its iconic landmarks, vibrant nightlife, and cultural significance.
fields.geographic_location: Western Russia, situated on the Moskva River.
fields.tourist_attractions: Red Square, Kremlin, St. Basil's Cathedral
fields.culinary_delights: Russian cuisine, including dishes like stroganoff and pirozhki.
fields.events_and_festivals: Moscow International Film Festival, City Day Celebration
